name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"3b492ab6-be40-4adf-a71c-ceb13c2e725e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: store","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"02025e3c-bb4f-480c-9e33-f307e5241776","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"store","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is the helper logic for attribute assignments, such as ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.name = "Bob"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"config.debug = True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Unlike simple variable assignment (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x = 1","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), storing a value in an attribute modifies the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"object","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" itself, which may be referenced by multiple variables. This function handles the logic of finding the correct object and updating its specific field.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8adfa5bf-24af-4e91-8c10-76cfa1f203a1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis needs to track object state. If you pass an object to a function ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"configure(obj)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and that function does ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"obj.active = True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the analyzer needs to know that the object is now active. ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"store","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ensures that the assignment is recorded against the object definition (e.g., the Class definition or a specific instance), so that other parts of the code checking ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"obj.active","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" see the update.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1bf8dbca-cab6-4675-a03a-144f27451b24","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9700f61a-153a-40c1-8d18-ddd4850135ad","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Resolution:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It resolves the base object ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"xList","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). It uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"getYPOint","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to find exactly which definition ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" refers to (e.g., an instance of class ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"128a3838-d3e0-40ea-94e0-8def0533537f","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Target Calculation:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It combines the object's namespace with the field name (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"f","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to get the full address of the attribute (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.User.name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"10dabd44-2cba-43be-b1e9-6743f4e695c5","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope vs. Global Update:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"a891ab45-d04e-4368-99a7-3b27a0d8ebd7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks if the attribute is a simple local definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5545a17b-9607-4afe-8700-018276a2299c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usually, attributes are structural. It records a change in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeManager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for the current scope (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self.current_ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), linking ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.User.name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the new value (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b633c3c3-0080-4d8b-8bf1-045d94b59b49","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It also updates the global definition of that field directly if it exists, ensuring the schema of the object is updated to reflect that it possesses this attribute.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"502c5712-fbc9-47d5-a77b-058cdb6072d4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Code:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9c57a23b-0bd7-45b5-b8ec-d1f89e28fd8e","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"p = Player()
p.score = 100","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"31daea65-1ea0-4f37-927e-2844be72a9fe","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"store","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" resolves ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"p","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Player","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"da7a53c7-12e1-49e7-a23c-474c79ab7462","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Target field is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"score","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d7d253f3-127e-4433-8263-0383e2cf53f5","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calculates the ID ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Player.score","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"447f5d0e-859a-4b6f-bf35-8436382ca1c9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It records that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Player.score","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" can hold the value ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"100","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Integer).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"382af268-e982-407e-b7dc-4d4e72aa0804","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now, anywhere ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Player.score","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is accessed, the analyzer knows it is an Integer.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"95a86096-b7c7-4eff-95ad-d02e7e982341","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
